title: Is This Really For Kids?
description: Is This Really For Kids is where I review children’s media and decide is it REALLY for kids? This podcast is designed to be a deep dive critical film analysis on children's media as well as entertaining every time. I designed this podcast for fans of the shows, new parents who are raising their children with intention, people who are so busy they can't keep up with watching everything but want to be able to talk about it, and for the people in my life to have a place to talk about our favorite films. What makes me qualified to talk about this? Well for starters, I grew up as a traumatized kid, so I know what not to do as a parent. Also since I was healing from my neglectful childhood, I learned a lot about trauma and life along the way. I am also a SAG-AFTRA actress with her own production company living in Los Angeles so I know what makes a good film and what it takes to make it.  You might have also noticed that unlike other podcasts, my episode art changes. I have a lot of pictures from my creative work, so I make the episode art an actual art piece inspired by the film. Pretty cool, huh? I hope you enjoy listening and you can reach me at any of the links below in the episodes. Thanks for listening!

title: 啊！ 是猫咪呀！
description:
【啊！是猫咪呀】是一档致力于探索人性和人物心理学的播客。

「猫咪」一词来源于美国电影编剧布莱克·斯奈德创造的编剧法则：被他称之为「救猫咪」的场面，是主人公做了某件事——比如救了一只猫咪——从而让观众认可、喜欢上他的决定性时刻。

我们剖析影视作品里的人物故事、观察普通人的生活、研究群体的心理现象，也会深挖自己的内心，旨在找出隐藏在形形色色故事里的「猫咪」——那些反映人性中真实、复杂、幽微的元素。

好奇心与同理心泛滥的我们，欣赏复杂而深邃的人性刻画，抵抗非黑即白的二元思维，关心个人成长，期待人与万物间持续发展出奇妙的联结。

欢迎大家通过下方的爱发电链接收藏、订阅打赏我们！
https://afdian.net/@ahsmmy

title: Linda's Bumpy Ride on a Bumpy Road
description:
Many of you may know me as an actress in Michael Crichton’s Premier film “Westworld” in which I played Arlette, robot prostitute who seduced & gave favors to Richard Benjamin. Now Richard was a fantastic actor to work with especially because he knew I was uncomfortable having to disrobe and undress. 

Richard might have been uncomfortable during that scene but I never noticed a hint of it. Off-screen he was a happily married man to a beautiful and highly talented actress Paula Prentiss, known for her comedy roles in many films. 

I’d like to mention that when actors don't have any lines of dialogue, it’s not as easy as you would think. Without words, the character has little to work with. As an audience, think about it and imagine what or how You would convey your thoughts to another person if you were unable to speak. Well, if you don’t agree, try it sometime. It isn’t easy my friends. 

Also, it was inferred that handsome James Brolin was having his way with another saloon gal. FYI - As an aside, James Brolin is married to the iconic “Out of this World” Singer, Actress, Award-Winning Barbra Streisand. 

Meanwhile, Brolin's character was being pursued by the Man in Black, Gunslinger Yul Brynner who was brilliant, outstanding, and very scary. Mr. Brynner was best known for being the staunch King in the legendary film "The King and I" with Award-Winning actress Deborah Kerr.  

Now regarding television, there was a well-known series called The Green Hornet (Green Hornet Music.. )in which you may know me as VAMA, the One and Only woman in history to "ZAP" the Great, Incomparable Bruce Lee as CATO.  During and between "takes" Bruce and I would talk at length about so many things but honestly He did most of the talking. He said he didn't easily open up to others but felt like he'd known me for a long time. That he felt safe & very comfortable. 

In The Batman 66 series (Batman Music)  I was The Riddler's female villain "MOTH". I will be giving fans much to chew on when talking about the show's Hero Adam West, his sidekick Burt Ward and the forever Memorable Frank Gorshin. Certainly More to share at another time. 

There are a slew of many other series such as Bewitched with Elizabeth Mongomery and Dick York, Lost in Space, Bonanza, and my Introductory and very first role in Ben Casey as well as many other roles in which I guest-starred.

Haute Honnah presents Empty Talk is a podcast where they talk, debate, review and create film and TV content mainly from Britain. 
Imeldha Eloni and Michael Honnah are two freelance filmmakers from the UK creating an exciting space for new and interesting stories in the British film and TV industry. Their company, Haute Honnah, was founded in 2019.

title: Arcade Militia
description: The best takes about videogames, books, movies and media - talking about the culture and context around them, not just the art. Jackie and Stef are two incredibly curious, inquisitive and imaginative sapphics that love to talk about all pieces of media and how they change our perception of other media. Come on and join the meta talk!

title: T's Reel Talk Podcast
description: T's Reel Talk Podcast is a conversation with some of the most talented and innovative filmmakers and audiences who love an occasional watch. From directors, actors, writers, and so on... We will be diving into the process, art, and lifestyle of filmmaking from every aspect. Even the occasional discussion with audiences who love a specific type of show or film.

title: Post Credit Scene
description: 14HQ Originals presents: Post Credit Scene Podcast, where Huss, Jason, Gaz & Manny discuss all things TV and film.

title: Haven't Scene It: A Movie Podcast
description:
A movie podcast with a pun in the title… this hasn't been done before!  Join hosts Tim Sestito & Tommy Thevenet in 'Haven't Scene It: A Movie Podcast' where all of your favorite movies will be discussed with a twist!  



Each movie featured on the show will have not been seen before by one of Tim or Tommy…New & classic films, a wide range of genres will all be covered on this show.  



If you're looking for a podcast with a little insight into movies, a lot of laughs and a pinch of stubbornness, come listen to our show!



Follow us on Twitter: @SceneItPod
Follow us on Instagram: @SceneItPod


Cover Art by Vladik Sestito
Intro Theme by Ryan the Oso

title: Inebriated Inq.
description: Hosts Draven and Savvy enjoy a few drinks and discuss their latest media fascinations. Part commentary and part comedy, we invite you to sit back, relax, and laugh at our inquiries into all things movies, shows, and fiction.

title: Podcast in a Pear Tree
description: Join L.A. transplants Aaron Lee, Danielle and Samantha as they share their honest (both sarcastic and appreciative) reviews of the latest Christmas movie offerings from Hallmark, Lifetime, and Netflix. Warning, massive spoilers ahead: discussing major plotlines and loveable details are the whole reason we're doing this!
author_name: Aaron Lee Harvey, Danielle Espino, Samantha Gifford

title: Podcast Part 3: The Part 3 Podcast
description:
What is it with *third* movies? Why can't trilogies ever seem to stick the landing? Why is it Part 3 when franchises gearshift to Tokyo Drifting or Season of the Witching? Why did it take three whole movies for Jason to find his hockey mask?!

Join hosts Will Morey and Sam Cherington as they break down the best and worst movies ever made that came after two other movies. Nothing is off limits... they're watching the good, the bad and the ugly. (Including The Good, the Bad and the Ugly!)

title: Black and Binging
description: Black and Binging is a podcast geared toward celebrating Black TV and Film by highlighting Black womxn leads and the tellings of our stories.

title: How Scary Is It?
description: Let's review movies! Join us as we watch horror movies and try to answer the question "How Scary Is It?"

title: The Drinking Corner
description: The NerdgazmicGoodfellas YouTube Channel brings you a group of friends that compete per episode to deliver the best stories and opinions across each episodic theme all the while enjoying a nice drink.

title: The Mid Podcast
description: We’re a mother and son duo, that love to talk about Geek stuff, Wrestling ,and love talking about random stuff

title: Inconceivable! Media
description:
Inconceivable! Media is a discussion podcast where the hosts take turns introducing each other to media that one person is familiar with and the other is not. Join Cam and Myles every other Thursday for a relaxing deep-dive into film, tv, music, online originals, and literature. Special episodes will occur outside the regular schedule and will include special guests.

This is a family-friendly podcast and any episodes discussing sensitive material will contain content warnings to keep listeners at home at ease and assured.

Feel free to follow us and join the conversation at the following:

Twitter: @M3diatalk

Instagram: golddragonmedia

Facebook: Gold Dragon Media

title: Phil At The Movies
description:
For The Love of Movies.

Passionate monologues and cinematic discussions. New episodes dropping every Friday!

title: Whatcha Been Watchin?
description:
Two brothers catching up, discussing the movies and media that motivate them, talking s#*t and laughing at our own whimsy.
Mike and Marcus Dudley meet twice monthly to geek out, make inside jokes, mock the things we love and build our galactic criminal empire.
Join us every other week when we dissect all things Pop Culture, critique the latest films, highlight our favorite classic movies, pit iconic characters into a sole-survivor deathmatch, sell out to our legions and ask the most important question:
 "Whatcha Been Watchin?"

title: The Idiot's Film Society
description: Hey! This is my film review podcast that I started with some friends. It isn't too serious so if you like movies as much as me, tag along.

title: Animated By Faith
description: Animator and movie buff, Jared Bupp, takes you behind the scenes of some of his favorite films. Sharing not only his love of movies but also his relationship with God. James 1:17 says, " Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights...". That's precisely what Bupp thinks a movie can be...a perfect, life-changing gift. Join him as you are invited to hear stories from some of your favorite artists and filmmakers from your childhood, and learn how God has animated their lives.

title: Somewhere Within the Rainbow
description: A new podcast where we simply...chat!

title: Obscuria Filmcast
description: There are currently close to half a million movies in circulation that date from the turn of the 20th century to the present day.  Obscuria Filmcast explores the countless films of note that have slipped through the cracks of history for one reason or another.  Our selections include box office flops that went on to become cult classics, made-for-TV movies that hold a special place in our hearts, groundbreaking documentaries that you've probably never heard of, as well as any obscure film with an emphasis on the strange, surreal, or grotesque.  Each week we rotate to a different host who presents a film for the other hosts to watch for the upcoming episode.  If you'd like to suggest a film for an upcoming episode and be featured as a guest on our special clubhouse edition of the podcast, feel free to email us at obscuriafilmpodcast@gmail.com.

title: The Last Podcast
description: Three friends who geek out, watch movies, and talk about things that we love and can relate to!

title: Movies, Films and Motion Pictures
description: A podcast for all things about cinema, movies or whatever you wanna call it! Tune in for an awesome time with Alex, Zandy and Claudia!

title: S&K Library
description:
Do you enjoy talking about your favorite books? Do you just want to rave about what's going on in the amazing fictional or non-fictional world you've deep-dived into, but no one can relate? We feel the same way! 

Join avid reader Spencer and English teacher Kristi as we start our marriage making each other read some of our favorite novels. We'll discuss, argue, and rant about our favorite literary moments in this monthly podcast.

You can visit our website for more information at https://sites.google.com/view/sklibrarypodcast/home

title: À Contre Courant
description: Programme d'actualité hebdomadaire avec Martin Paquette, Charles Barchechath et Pierre Cadoret

title: Amateur Movie Reviews
description:
The show of shows
Be ready be dazzled and amazed and maybe just learn something as three mates share their opinions on some of the biggest films worldwide.

Listen in as they provide some banter, some laughter and give you the opinions that you did not know you needed

Welcome to AMR
author_name: Harry Lee, Sam Lake and Louis Davies

title: Industry Babies
description:
what if people in entertainment were young and also smart? nick and libby try to tackle that tough question while giving you their perspective and insight on working in the industry from an ant's eye view.

@industrybabiespod

title: Face Character Rejects
description: Every kid thinks life will be a Disney movie until they grow up and realize they’re more likely to be friends with the Ugly Stepsisters than Cinderella. Madi Evans and Keith Maultbay are two BFFs and the hilarious hosts of “Face Character Rejects,” a new Disney movie recap podcast. Join Madi and Keith as they dive deep into the Disney vaults, exploring some of your favorite (and maybe not-so-favorite) films, spreading the love and poking some fun at all things from the House of Mouse. New episodes arrive weekly. This show is NSFW and intended for adults ONLY.

title: We be talking!
description: The gang gets up to some shenanigans and talks the entire time! Oh boy! I can't wait to see what happens next!

title: Queens of the Game
description:
Célunk bemutatni, megmutatni, elfogadtatni a nők jelenlétét az esportban, a gamerek világában.
Szeretnénk ugyanezekkel a lányokkal párbeszédet indítani mindenről ami foglalkoztatja őket, legyen az a virtuális világban,vagy a való életben.
Elképzelhetetlen azonban, mindehhez a fiúk/férfiak támogatása nélkül, hiszen velük és velünk kerek a világ.

Mindezt izgalmasan, kalandozva a platformok közt, a gamer világ teljes térképén.

Jelmondatunk: "a játékban mindenkinek helye van" Józsa Balázs 9 éves

title: Windsor Film Club

El Podcast y Canal de Cine que Nadie Pidió

Con @Kaizzer, @Zomvieck, @ElGab y @Humberto_Ramos y producido por @iraamelnegro

Noticias,  Cartelera del Cine, Recomendaciones de que ver en Netflix y en la Cartelera.

Video nuevo todos los Martes... en la noche. Ya cuando baje el solecito. ;)

title: Hanging Out With
description: Want to travel back to a time where you and your dumb friends shared and argued over media? That's what we hope to accomplish, creating the nostalgic feeling of a film school party. Join the Hanging Out With Cast as we dive into why media matters to us, with a blend of a night out at the bar with buds, to critical analysis and deep dives into our favorite bits of media.  HOW-Casts will be divided into two types; HOW Friends, these are more periodic with a fun catch up with the Cast, talking about things they have watched or played recently and what they like and dont like about them. HOW Media, these will be deep dives into one topic with long form discussion with the Cast about that topic specifically.

title: Easy Bake Takes
description: Best Friends Kat and Ryley are fresh out of film school and ready to share their opinions. They read the one-star reviews of your favorite films and more.

title: Trumans Filmwelt
description: Kritiken zu Filmen und Serien.

title: What Do You Want To Watch?
description: Nathan English and David Derks, two former roommates in their 20s, talk about the things they want to watch - everything from movies to sports.

title: Flix with Lara
description: A quirky and fun film review podcast with amateur film critic, Lara Miller.

title: George Bowman and Friends
description:
Live weekly show between 3pm to 5pm every Thursday for the University of Nottingham Radio (URN). 
Link to listen live: https://urn1350.net/

Feel good chat show, with me (George!) inviting on various friends to have a debate about a different meaty topic each week. This could be anything from sport, conspiracy theories, or films! We also have various other features sprinkled in with everything else. These features include a quiz called suddURN death, a defend the indefensible, and a little bit of fantasy football chat.

Please go and follow the show on Instagram, the username is @George_Bowman_and_Friends.
I would love to hear from you, and for you to get involved with the show, so please DM me on instagram or email George.Bowman.and.Friends@outlook.com.

title: The Emi Awards
description: Welcome to the Emi Awards! I'm your host, Emiliana (Emi) Cardinale. Every week on The Emi Awards, I plan to share my thoughts on what I've been watching and rewatching, with the occasional personal episode about my life! Please tune in if you're interested and feel free to share your thoughts with me about the shows I mention and review if you'd like!! If you listen to even one episode, thank you so much. It means a lot to me :)

title: In For the Night
description: In For the Night is a podcast that discusses movies, random topics and gives you an excuse to just stay in for the night

title: Filmgazers
description: Join Steph & Jess, cousins and movie fiends since childhood, as they reminisce about films from the past. Occasional guest appearances by some of their film obsessed cohorts. A lighthearted show featuring reviews and discussions with a focus on the science fiction/horror/fantasy trinity and 20th century entertainment.

title: The Extra Point
description: Your home for the best sports takes and analysis

title: Can We Pause it?
description: A podcast where we watch movies and pause on parts to unpack them a little bit more before pressing play again.

title: Andy's Podcasts
description: Early stages.

title: Filmoids
description: Your hosts Jonah and Mahoney gather to discuss the cultural, political, aesthetic and historical aspects of only the finest kino. If you wish the irony-poisoned condescension dripping from every prolific Letterboxd reviewer could be piped directly into your ears, you've come to the right place.

title: THE LOVE OF FILM
description:
THE LOVE OF FILM is a Video and Audio Podcast by Film Lovers, Critics, Students, Filmmakers, Directors, Producers, Actors and more.
We simply, voraciously love Film. We discuss films from every direction.
The Good, the Bad and the Ugly. The Large, the Small and the Independent.
The scenes and behind the scenes.
The Budgeted and the non-budgeted. Every decade. Specific Films, Art Films, Directors, Cinematographers, Actors. Sub-genres.
Everything. US and Foreign Films.
It’s our game - Please join us on this adventure.

title: A Little Independent
description: A Little Independent is a movie podcast hosted by two lifelong movie-lovers sharing their love of independent, obscure, or just plain weird movies.  Hosts Ryan Buck and Todd Burnaska are long-time friends and film fanatics who have been on their respective missions to find and share with one another movies that don’t get all the attention…or the CGI.  And some that might just be a little too strange to exist even at all.  Alas, Todd and Ryan have been discovering and discussing these types of movies for years and now they are thrilled to share the experience with you.  Yeah, it may get weird...But you might also make a new friend.

title: In Horror We Trust
description: Join horror-philiacs Christine and Carissa as we share our not-so-expert opinions and observations on everything spooky. From the latest horror releases to our favorite kills, we’re just two movie-freak minds gushing over all the things that make us love the genre!

title: Watcha Call It
description: Three guys from three different walks of life. And with these different  upbringing makes for some great conversations. Tune in and join in and see what all the hype is about

title: The Writer Brothers
description: The Writer Brothers is primarily a general interest entertainment podcast covering shows, movies, videogames and even books. We are mostly family friendly in that we try to keep our main podcast content PG-13. We do try to support and promote all voices provided they are clear and respectful of others. Though we are staunchly anti-censorship, our brand does have rules and we do have to follow the rules of our platform hosts. We do also offer consultation services through our tiers for original works as well as offer the opportunity to promote them.

title: Above the Convenience Store
description: Massive David Lynch fans and members of the r/TwinPeaks discord server Saoirse and Steve watch through Twin Peaks and try to make sense of the madness

title: Dezil & Reeser
description:
Each episode, hosts Stefan Dezil and Jeffrey Reeser explore two films from past and present, how they relate and differ and how the cinematic medium is continuing to evolve. 

Jeffrey Reeser is a filmmaker and writer from Ojai, CA whose credits include the features "Shadow of a Gun", "Take None Give None", "Super Heady" and the forthcoming "Snake Oil Song". He currently resides in Los Angeles.

Hailing from NY and South FL, Stefan Dezil is an American genre filmmaker, actor and illustrator of Haitian descent. He has worked with Disney, 20th Digital, VICE, Noisey, and Soundcloud. For his film "The Treadmill", he was nominated for the prestigious international Lumen Prize in the moving image category.  His latest, "THIRST" is currently streaming on HULU.

title: SpacePod Podcast
description: Welcome to the SpacePod Podcast, the podcast where two pilots talk about the most random topics in the world of entertainment. Games, movies, comic books, you name it. So why don't you come up and get comfy in the SpacePod.

description: A podcast where two teachers review a movie each week and connect it to popular culture and our crazy lives as teachers. New episodes every Friday! teacherstalkfilm@gmail.com

Here at Federation radio - a star trek podcast I intend to review every single star trek episode and bring you all in on some of my more interesting theories and opinions. 
feel free to email - federationradiostartrek@gmail.com

description: Guts and Ghouls is a podcast made up of two childhood friends that share a love for the horror genre. We review new releases, share our favorite horror films, and discuss anything horror cinema related.

title: Baking to the B Movies
description: Longtime friends Ashley & Stef have a lot of things in common- but nothing moreso than their love of bad horror movies and getting experimental in the kitchen. They've combined this passion to bring you 'Baking to the B Movies'- a deep dive into some of the best of the worst (or worst of the worst) horror movies and share recipes inspired by each film they suffer through.

title: Cloven Hoof
description: It's the official podcast of cloven-hoof.com where we'll be discussing movies, video games, and more every two weeks!

title: FAPCAST

description: A horror podcast. Mostly reviews, but hopefully some other stuff will be coming your way too. Stay tuned and beware the moon!

title: The Entertainment Inquisition
description: How does the entertainment industry portray Christianity? Through watching and evaluating movies and television series, Allison Steinkamp will ask the questions that we all want answers to. Is the Exorcist realistic? Why do Christian children love VeggieTales? Why are Christian women in television shows, such as Angela Martin in the Office or Mary Cooper in the Big Bang Theory, portrayed as overly strict and judgmental? How has Christian entertainment changed in the past decade? Tune in every week to learn more about this pop culture phenomena!

title: Awesome Pod Mix
description: When a piece of art invokes a similar feeling amidst a large audience, it's the triumph of the filmmaker. That's the magic of cinema and we at Awesome Pod Mix love the magic of cinema. On this podcast, we focus on how certain Movies and TV Shows made us feel when we watched them for the first time. If you like what I'm doing, you can support me on Patreon. Thanks.

description: A Biweekly Podcast where Ali & Manny talk about anime (and other stuff).  Spoilers for everything in the title of the episode.

Just a couple of guys here to talk about movies and have a good time!
Join Us!

title: The Ride Home
description: Abby, a two-time Emmy winning Editor, and Caitlin, a Middle School Counselor, go to the movies every Thursday Night. With new episodes every Friday, ride home with them from the movies for lighthearted and honest reviews. Check out The Ride Home's instagram page at theridehome_podcast and send all inquiries to theridehome.pod@gmail.com

title: Fans On Film
description: A movie podcast! To suggest a movie or give us some feedback Please email us at fansonfilm@outlook.com

Join us as we talked about overarching anime themes like brotherhood, little sister complex and human instrumentality, answer anime's biggest questions like, "Is Piccolo Black?" and "Who is your biggest anime crush?" We'll take deep dives into the genres most recognizable titles like Neon Genesis Evangelion, Cowboy Bebop, Naruto, and much more! These discussions will get deep, so grab your favorite drink and buckle up!

title: The Geek Shot
description: The Geek Shot es un podcast de 4 amigos que se reúnen semanalmente para hablar de cine, videojuegos, comics y anime. title: B-Cast Cult
description: Join Mike and Mal as they review low-budget movies, cult classic films, bargain bin gems, and the occasional new release. Get ready for spoilers! Recut episodes from the original show.

title: The CineMatch Podcast
description: A movie podcast pitting two of Hollywood's greatest movies against each other, every week, and rating each through a series of different categories such as their lead character, villain and soundtrack, to see which reigns supreme!

description: Loose Candy is a watch-along (or is it listen-along) podcast where folks can just chill with Erik as he watches and comments on whatever shows or movies he wants. If you're someone who hates binging alone, turn on Loose Candy and vibe with Erik.

A podcast where we dive below the surface of movies.

title: Trophies are for Winners
description:
A discussion of TV, movies, and culture - and why your opinion doesn’t matter. 😳 Because Timmy, not everyone is a winner, and your participation ribbon means you’re just the first loser. 😢

The point is, Scott and Nancy discuss their favorite TV shows and movies from a unique perspective - theirs. Sure, sometimes they end up going way too deep into related (and not) ways that the cultural B.S. of the moment tends to ruin those very shows, films - and life. But hold on there Timmy, it's all in good fun because when you get down to it, we're all likely just as screwed as the other.

If you're offended, perhaps you should ask yourself why you'd let these two knuckleheads live in your head rent-free. Or at least what's so wrong with your existence that a podcast is your trigger - a podcast. There are Hollywood purse dogs that are terrified of going to the bathroom on the grass. Yes, real-world issues to worry about.

They have unscripted, organic, and honest conversations about way too much, that for some reason they think you need to hear.

TAFW uses Pixabay for episode music.

Welcome to Highbrow / Lowbrow!

Highbrow: Scholarly. Rarefied. Refined.
Lowbrow: Lacking in taste, culture, intelligence.

When it comes to the Silver Screen, some of our favorite actors have taken some BIG swings. Sometimes they hit it out of the park and even win an Oscar; other times, they almost ruin their careers…!

Each week, Matthew & Eddie will take one actor and talk about two of their movies: One, a glorious "highbrow" pinnacle of their career, and two, a puzzling "lowbrow" choice has confused the masses to no end!

Tune in every Friday as Highbrow / Lowbrow compares and contrasts the vast polarity of your favorite actors' filmography

title: Post Credit Depression
description:
Podcast where 3 friends shoot the shit and escape the world by sharing and indulging in new media content every week :0 We all know the feeling that exists at the end of your new favorite movie, video game, or tv show. The way you hyper-fixate on whatever theory or character that's consuming your mind. It's to the point where you can't stop annoying your friends about it until they watch. That's the feeling we're trying to recreate by sharing media we love, with hopes the others will enjoy!

New episodes every Tuesday! 
Find us on Instagram and Twitter! @PostCreditDep

description: Submit to the World Domination Committee, a monthly podcast hosted by neutral evil Trynn Zala and chaotic neutral X Zala. The Zalas explore the villain's journey as opposed to that of the hero, the philosophy/ethics behind what makes a villain, and if they were truly righteous in trying to control the world!

Cinema at Random explores the corners of 20th century cinema. We will be drawing through lines between movies that at first glance may not seem to have much in common and make a case for why they should be watched as a double bill. 

So join your host Jonathan Niederer, an LA based filmmaker and movie lover for a cinema at random hang out experience chock full of passionate debates, outrageous takes, and exciting new cinema discoveries. The only rule: no movies made after 1999.

title: Beware the Board
description:

title: De Nominerte: filmpodkast

Vi ser og diskuterer alle de tidligere nominerte og vinnere av Oscars’ beste film!

Første Oscar utdeling ble holdt i 1929, og siden har det vært utdeling hvert år. Vi skal for hver episode se alle filmene som har blitt nominert i kategorien "beste film" dét året. Så skal vi snakke om filmene, diskutere hva vi synes om de og hvilken film vi mener var den beste det året.

Episodene blir lagt ut fortløpende, så snart vi har en episode klar. Dette er fordi vi dessverre ikke har kapasitet til å lage episoder fast.

description:
Semi-weekly podcast where movie aficionado Blake Layton talks about the latest movie and TV news/movies and TV he’s recently seen. Joining him occasionally are random guests that include Blake’s own friends or various influencers.

"B*tch shut the f*ck up and eat a cinnamon roll!"
- Blake Layton

title: In 3's
description: A podcast of 3 friends who review pop culture media. From movies, video games, music and everything in between.

title: ¡QUÉ MOVIE! PODCAST
description: Un podcast para los amantes de la historia del séptimo arte y todo lo que pasa detrás de cámara de las películas y series más icónicas. Escríbenos a quemoviepodcast@gmail.com Instagram: @quemoviepodcast
author_name: Joel Polanco, Camila Santana y Johnny Morales Jr.

title: The Movie Rubric
description:
Many critics assign numbered scores to movies, but very few use a universal system across the board that the audience themselves can use. Here on The Movie Rubric, we narrowed down the 5 most important categories to a films success, and made a grading rubric that we will use to score each movie, much like a teacher would grade a paper, to make sure we give each movie a fair shake, and the same criteria. 

Join us as we do our best to sound smart, and try even harder to not sound stupid, and review some of the best and worst movies coming out today!

title: Cinema Vixens
Turn The Mic Up Podcast
description: Microphone check 1,2. A new podcast is here! With two of Charlotte’s own, Perseus and Drew. Here with fresh perspectives on things close to them the most. That being music (especially Hip-Hop), movies (except them tear jerking chick flicks) and more.  Filled with deep dives (maybe not) and takes  on all things relevant and as well as throwbacks. Either way, ironically, their lives are now your entertainment. So let’s take it back with this..yo! Put the mic on!!

title: Throw in the Pal
description: Welcome to Throw in the Pal, a podcast where three mildly talented, majorly struggling actors attempt the impossible in looking for fresh material to mine for online discourse. And wouldn’t you know it, turns out movie’s are a thing, so that’s what we’re going with! Each week, Frank, Marcus, and Tom bat about their opinions on a new film, trying to persuade each other that they have the hottest take in the room. It rarely gets violent, but it’s always a little sad. Enjoy Pals!
author_name: Frank Kerr, Marcus Hensley, and Tom Butler

title: You're Probably Not Listening

title: Tragicomic: A Coming Of Age Podcast
description:
movies are fun, growing up is not. let's talk about it!

before each podcast, i sit down with my best friends of all different backgrounds and watch their favorite coming of age movies. then, after briefly reviewing it, i use the themes of the film as a catalyst to explore how they grew up and what made them into the people they are today. hopefully this podcast will serve as both a mechanism to analyze some of my favorite coming of age movies and a time capsule for my friends and i to look back on in a couple years & enjoy. thanks for watching!

title: NT Movie Reviews

Now, we offer an audio take on the latest films and news in the world of cinema. We'll cover theatrical releases, streaming and digital releases, film background information, and we'll offer more in-depth discussions about particular films as well.

#books #movies #bookreview #moviereview #watchmorebooks #podcast #booksvsmovie #whichisbetter #bookdiscussion #moviediscussion #entertainment #recommendations #listen #watchmorebookspodcast #destryevans #biweekly #fortheloveofbooks #welovemovies

SPOILER ALERT: We discuss some of the best and worst scenes in the movies we've selected. And while we can't always reveal which movies will be up for discussion, we suggest you proceed with caution when listening. Otherwise, feel free to live on the edge and listen with pure abandonment!

Do you have a show or movie that defines who you are? The Genre Of Your Life is a podcast all about the movies and shows that define who we are as individuals! Why do certain movies and shows hit us differently than others? If your life was a library full of movies and shows what would the catalog be? Tune in every week to hear us discuss the genres of our lives!

Now here they are to talk about anything and everything from music and film, to pop culture and random nonsense. Every episode, one of us suggests a movie that the other one has never seen and we talk about it for a while. Join the movie club and listen along every week to join in on the conversation!

Welcome to The Review Takes Podcast hosted by Mr. Review and Dr. Dissect! Our podcast strives to share our love of cinema with the film-fanatic community. Sit back, grab your favorite pop and candy, and listen to what our hosts have to say about the movie of the week! 

Follow us on social media!

Twitter: @ReviewTakes

Instagram: @thereviewtakespodcast

title: Still Holds Up?
description:
What happens when 2 opinionated suburban Dads from corporate America decide to spend the little time that they have, re-watching movies and TV shows to see if they stand the test of time? Of course they create a podcast to discuss it.
 
Along with some interesting takes, host Robbie and co-host Max, ask each other that classic question out-loud - "it was great back then, but does it still hold up?" We’re rewatching classic movies of the 80’s, 90’s, early 2000s, major franchises, cinematic universes, binge worthy TV series and any and everything we love.
 
Come and let’s breakdown some of our favorite movies, TV shows and much more on Still Holds Up? A Rot Your Brain Media Podcast.

description: A group of hosts by the names of Lincoln, Declan, and Sam have put together this series to explore the different sides of world building, praise and criticize different stories, and go deep into geek thought. From Cinematic masterpieces, to movies and stories that might only be known by us! We are not hardcore by any means… We are only very Nearly Nerds.

with a focus on horror and thriller movies. every week a new double feature of films that share a common theme.

Discussioni cinematografiche tra marito e moglie.

These beefy boys talk comedies, action, thrillers, horror, and romance films on this goofy little pod. Make sure to follow them on Patreon at Patreon.com/bucketofbeefshow for access to additional content such as detailed reviews of The Last of Us on HBO Max and full reviews of horror movies like Jeepers Creepers and Midsommar!

description: Hey everyone we're Lets Talk Entertainment and media, we've been on youtube for a while now and we have decided to take our show and put out to podcast's as well. Well have two shows on here, Lets Talk Physical media and The Lets Talk Podcast. If you like the show we hope you subscribe and leave your comments.

description: Movie podcast featuring two film buffs that met at a video store. The inspiration for this show was to talk about movies once again. We hope you tune in and watch with us!

title: The Abby Normal Podcast
description: ROC City based Horror Movie Podcast. Our episodes consists of reviews & discussions, games & trivia's and guest host specials talking about all things horror.

description: Join up-and-comers Josh Toomes (@joshtoomes.films) Ellis Pignanelli, Felicity Horsfall and Archie Smith as weekly they go through their MOVIE/TV WATCHLIST and discuss what's going on in the film world right now.

title: Piano Americano
description:
Piano America è il primo podcast di Riccardo Pitari: regista, videomaker e fotografo.
È un podcast in cui si parla di video e foto, e tanto altro; anche grazie all'aiuto di tanti ospiti.
Il podcast dura qualche minuto nei quali si racconta  l'evoluzione del modo tecnologico applicato ai diversi settori con un'occhio di attenzione per fotografia e videomaking.
Gli episodi escono sempre ogni due giovedì!

title: Binging the Devil's Fruit

John, an artist/animator and long-time One Piece fan takes his friend and co-host Austen, an animation nerd who has never read One Piece before, through the series, so what better way then to document the journey! Additionally, we will also review the various movies and specials.

title: Requiem Por Un Podcast

Un podcast de Carlos Jesús Paredes, Neus Almodóvar, Albert Oltra, Adrián Sanmartín y Santiago Ruíz. Nuevos episodios cada domingo.
author_name: Carlos Jesús Paredes, Neus Almodóvar, Albert Oltra, Adrián Sanmartín y Santiago Ruíz

title: La Bona Merda
description: En Cobra i en Jordi veuen moltes i moltes pel·lis. Algunes són una caca, però d'altres són el que la comunitat cinèfila underground anomena "una bona merda": és a dir, pel·lis que ho peten. En aquest podcast, els dos amics no només comentaran les pel·lis que han vist l'últim mes sinó que també n'analitzaran una en profunditat amb el seu propi mètode: Els Jocs Reunits Jeiper, un seguit de jocs a l'atzar que els ajudaran a desxifrar els missatges més amagats del film en qüestió. Si també ets d'aquella minoria rara que s'emociona amb detallets friquis d'historietes que es veuen en una pantalla o simplement t'agrada indagar en els intringulis del setè art; aquest és el teu podcast de cinema en català.

title: Hablemos claro
description: Bienvenidos al podcast "Hablemos claro", donde discutiremos las últimas tendencias en el mundo del cine y la televisión. En cada episodio, analizaremos las últimas películas y series que han sido lanzadas, y daremos nuestras opiniones honestas y sin filtros. Además, también discutiremos las críticas que estas producciones han recibido y cómo esas críticas afectan a la percepción del público. Si estás cansado de las reseñas superficiales y quieres escuchar opiniones reales, este es el lugar para ti.

title: 1001: A Film Podyssey

We also release weekly 'Top 3' episodes - these episodes can be about any film, whether it's Ivan's Childhood or Stuart Little 2 , we've got it covered.

'Main Review' episodes are released every Friday and the 'Top 3' episodes come out every Tuesday.

LINKTREE: https://linktr.ee/1001pod

Letterboxd Master List: https://letterboxd.com/1001filmpod/list/1001-a-film-podyssey-master-list/

title: Dying for Midnight
description:
DFM - Horror Movies Discussion and More Podcast:
A quirky, quippy, sometimes awkward couple discuss their love for all things horror (while trying so hard not to get off track). ~~

Every DFM episode features 2 segments. ~~
1st segment: Comfy Horror Review - Grab a blanket and a hoodie. We discuss everything from the poster artwork,  to favorite non-lead character and death, giving an overall reaction and rating and where possible, touch on other entries. ~~

2nd segment: Horror Etc. - We'll cover a variety of horror topics including literature, personal haunts, horror history, etc, etc, etc.

title: Mediamancers
description: Mediamancers is your ultimate guide to rediscovering classic media from the past decades. Join us as we revisit movies, TV shows, and games that have stood the test of time and examine if they're worth enjoying again in today's world. Whether it's a hidden gem or a cultural artifact that hasn't aged well, Mediamancers is your source for fresh perspectives on old favorites. Every episode, we take an in-depth look at the cultural, societal, and political context of the media and explore whether it holds up or if it's best left in the past. Tune in for critical discussions and incredible moments on each episode of Mediamancers.

title: Creatively Procrastinating Podcast
description:
Welcome to the many venting sessions of your fellow Creative Procrastinator (Patrick) that is completely and unapologetically me rambling on about everything and anything! Can be Comic Book / pop culture stuff, Movies / TV Shows / Video Games, Music, Fitness, past life experiences and advice AND MORE IF YOU CAN BELIEVE IT!

So, chillax and enjoy me ramble for how ever long I can before I creep back into procrastination (Creatively, of course.)

In this Podcast, these personalities clash as each episode, one of the three of us will get to choose a movie of their liking for the other two to watch and react to. Then taking everyone's different opinions, we try to organize it together to create an object rating that suits all of us.

description: A podcast where we discuss movies that are certified "rotten" (critic rating below 60%) on Rotten Tomatoes. We bring our reviews to the table and give our own score deeming it either rotten to the core (below 60%) or rotten no more (60% and above).

title: The Sidekick Critic Podcast
description: Welcome to the Sidekick Critic Podcast! It's time we gave attention to all the Robins of the world, especially while looking at the film industry. In that vein we are happy to present this new film & entertainment industry podcast! Our love for film and seeing movies in theaters has spawned this new podcast. Join us while we review the newest releases to theaters, highlight the sidekicks of each film we review, and look at the film industry at large and give our thoughts on it!

title: The Catholic Dynamic Duo
description:
After having sought the truth his whole life, Vatman (Winston) fell for the many lies of the world falling into atheism and a life of sin. While having many scary experiences with the occult and demonic attacks, he finally realized that God was true, but his question was what religion's God was true? Having been baptized in the Catholic Church, but experiencing a traumatizing uncatholic childhood, he was left feeling like in no way was the Catholic Church the real Church of God. Having avoided the True Church and trying out many spiritual practices, God finally revealed His power and truth to Vatman (Winston). With the experience and research he could no longer doubt the Catholic Church.

After having been in love with the fantasy stories that came off the comic book pages and superhero movies, Cardinal (Sebastian) always wished that these stories were true or that superpowers were real. Funny enough he found out that they were true. After being caught by God in a time when he was finally willing to submit to him and attempt to give up sin, it was revealed to him how truly marvelous God is and how much He is a superhero and one that is real. After coming back to the Catholic church he met even more superheroes with the Saints. It was clear how much God's Saints are almost like sidekicks with real life superpowers being given from the real superhero himself Jesus.

Together The Catholic Dynamic Duo Podcast hope to provide a fun open space for all believers and non-believers hoping to be a great representation of Christ and not coming off as people trying to brainwash. Hopefully as a believer or not you can find enjoyment in our conversations of how much the true story of the Catholic faith influences fan favorite fictional storytelling, showing how marvelous and super heroic the Catholic faith truly is. Being the greatest Catholic detective duo, thanks to the Holy Spirit, we're able to see God's creativity in every nerdy work of fiction.

Holy Catholic Church Vatman !

title: The Ineffables
description:
「旧书市集的神呀，在知识之前，请先给我们润泽吧。」——《春宵苦短少女前进吧》森见登美彦

书籍和影视为我们日常所面对的贫瘠与苦难搭建起了一座座圣所，包容着无数旅者逃离现实一头扎进这些海市蜃楼般的幻象——而我们只希望透过各自生活的缝隙对这无数难以言喻（ineffable）的奇景进行一些管中窥豹。

本节目将每次以一部文艺作品（题材与媒介不限）为中心进行拓展讨论。

title: Weird Side Podcast
description:
Welcome to Weird Side Podcast!

Hey there everyone, special shoutout to all you fellow weird folks out there! I'm Hannah, and my husband Taylor and I welcome you to our podcast. On this podcast, we will be discussing a wide range of topics with our primary ones including horror films, true crime, and dark history/topics. Weird Side Podcast is a safe place for all of us weirdos out there to discuss topics that most people don't talk a lot about. Our purpose is not entertainment, but education. We hope you enjoy, and we welcome you to join the Weird Side.

title: 本来堂
description:
《本来堂》是围绕着青年电影人和创作者的一款访谈与影评节目。

电影是属于每一人的广场，我们一同聚集在此，各自欢喜，又或成为别人梦里的过客。我们不需要成为某种权威才可以在公共空间里谈论电影，有关电影的表达可以属于每一个人。也许，我们在当下最不需要的就是一言九鼎的权威和一家独大的自信。在这个过于宁静的“后时代”，我们想要的是主流之外的众声喧哗。

《本来堂》为在世界各处生活的中文创作者提供一个安全的聚集所，在讨论影视、艺术、科技和社会之中来构建一个全球化的中文社群。并在这过程中，记录、支持并且滋养所有在世界各处落地生根的中文语境。

title: Bite-Sized Cinema Podcast
description: The podcast where we discuss a film and cook a food from that film. For visual content, find us on Instagram, TikTok, or YouTube.

title: Let's Review with Layla and You
description:
During these podcast episodes we will be reviewing pretty much anything and everything. Every possible topic is up for discussion and we lay it all out, no topic is off limits. And here’s the twist: all of this will be reviewed from the perspective of a MINORITY

With these podcast episodes I would like to create a space where we can exchange our stories in relation to the episode-of-the-week review by exchanging the many ways that is has moved us, be it positively: by helping us through dark times, or negatively: by possibly triggering us or forcing us to face some harsh truths about the world and or ourselves.

My wish is to create a place and create space to offer support, share and where together we create a community where that is the focus of our story - the many ways we are connected.

FunFact: I myself am both a survivor and therapist! And all of the different avenues of my life mentioned in the Introduction will be touched upon and shared as we are reviewing.

Who said a podcast can't be both Educational and Fun?

For more, also see: https://www.instagram.com/lets.review.with.layla.and.you/

Hope to see ya back for more! 🔥

title: Read the Book Seen the Movie
description: Read the book seen the movie is a new podcast which deep dives into movies and TV series that are based on books. Whether they are novels, memoirs, self-help, or comic books, it seems that many stories on the big (or small) screen have originated in print form first. We'll delve into the differences, and what works and what doesn't in storytelling between the two mediums.

title: A Slice of Cinematic Pie
description:
Four film making friends discuss all things cinema in a pie related context. Because, let’s be honest, who doesn’t love pie? Did the delicious crust tempt us to the cinema? Was the filling satisfying? Did it leave us with trapped wind? Would we go back for seconds? All these questions and more will be answered.

Allergy Warning: May contain swearing and E-numbers.

A Tin Hat Podcast.

General enquiries: cinematicpie@gmail.com

title: Bad Movies Worse Opinions
description:

The Bad Movies Worse Opinions podcast where Carrington Harrison, Rob Brenton and special guests rewatch and review movies that are rated below a 6.0 on the popular movie site IMDB and determine whether or not those reviews are too high, too low or just right.

Download wherever you get your podcasts!

description: '3 Euros per Movie' is a Movie Podcast brought to you by Bia, Krit and Georg. We are three Europeans that have come together for in depth spoiler discussions on three thematically related movies. Episodes release bi-weekly and we hope to see you every episode! Social Links: https://linktr.ee/3euros

title: That's so Cliché
description:
Do you love cozying up in front your television and popping on a new movie, tv or classic film?

Join hosts Geneva Rooney and Mikaela Roberts for your fortnightly movie club. Where we talk through some of the movies we're currently loving or love to revisit.

So grab the popcorn, hit play and join us for “That’s so Cliché”.

title: Back to the Pictures
description:
Welcome to this fortnightly podcast hosted by Ben Rose, Ian Green and Anthon Ogundimu, three former university roommates - reviewing movies like you've never heard before.

This trio of student-loan, debt-ridden 30-somethings pledge to re-watch and re-evaluate the movies they once viewed together (usually over a Pot Noodle) during their student days. Follow them, as they discover whether their once treasured flicks still hold up against the standards of cynical life-experience and evolving tastes.

Each episode, they travel BACK TO THE PICTURES, screening a movie first viewed during 2005-2009. Moreover, each week the audience are serenaded with film trivia, plot breakdowns and excruciating knit-picking guided by impossible standards. Discussions are glued together with fond memories, private jokes and aimless banter.

From Ian's shoutouts to classic film characters such as 'Sausage Charlie' to his shrewd observation of supermarket trolly quantum mechanics, to Anthon's nigh eidetic attention to detail and Ben's nihilistic approach to filmic discourse, this podcast is a shout-out to the duped generation - Viva La Higher Education Act 2004!

title: Adventurelings | The Adventure Movie Podcast
description:
You know those people who talk through movies that everyone hates? That’s us. Adventurelings is an unscripted podcast for adventure movie fans, hosted by siblings Mason and Emily Winsauer. If you’re obsessed with adventure movies and love to hang around and talk about them with your friends, this is the podcast for you.

For more content, check us out on Instagram and Patreon, or visit theadventurelings.com for everything, all in one place.

title: Theater Cleaners
description:
Welcome to Theater Cleaners - the podcast where we take a lighthearted look at the world of movies, hosted by Todd and Dom, two former film school students who now work in the industry.

Join us as we journey through the history of cinema, analyzing films from the earliest days of moving images through to modern-day blockbusters. We'll explore what makes certain movies influential and memorable, and what makes others forgettable.

Each episode, we'll take a deep dive into a specific film, the plot, characters, themes, and production elements, discussing what works and what doesn't, and we'll share our personal opinions and experiences along the way.

So whether you're a die-hard cinephile or a casual movie-goer, join us as we explore the world of cinema, one film at a time. You might even learn a thing or two along the way. Thanks for tuning in to Theater Cleaners!

description: Ever wonder why you can watch your favorite movie a hundred times and still love it? Is it the humor? Perhaps it's the plot or the acting. Join me and a featured guest each week while we (attempt to) get to the bottom of this question by doing a deep-dive on a groundbreaking film. We'll discuss everything we can, including fun facts, acting, soundtrack, cultural impact and more on our quest to figure out why, after so many views, people keep coming back to the same movies.

title: Just Cuz

title: The Secret Bobo Movie Podcast
description:
I am Bobo, and this is my movie podcast, which is a secret.

I am sick and tired of much of the modern discourse around this commercialized art form. This podcast aims to be an outlet to document my thoughts on contemporary movies while practicing how I talk about stories. I hope to give my unique perspective as someone who studied and works on professional film. All while keeping it TOP SECRET!!! Do not listen and do not share!

title: The Lit Flick Club
description:
Welcome to "The Lit Flick Club" podcast! Get ready to dive into the fascinating worlds of literature, cinema, and television as we enter new worlds every Friday. Join me as I dive into the pages of captivating, discusses new movies, and unravels the narratives of binge-worthy TV shows.

Each episode of "The Lit Flick Club” is a delightful mix of lively discussions, insightful analysis, and engaging banter. I am here to ignite your imagination, spark intellectual conversations, and provide you with a community of fellow enthusiasts who share the love for storytelling in all its forms.

Whether you're an avid reader, a cinephile, or a TV series addict, this podcast is your haven. A diverse selection of books, movies, and TV shows, ranging from classics to contemporary works, covering various genres and themes is carefully curated every month. Expect everything from thrilling mysteries and epic adventures to heartwarming romances!

Not only will I share my thoughts and opinions on the chosen works, but I also invite you, the incredible listeners, to be an integral part of the conversation. Through the social media platforms and interactive segments, I encourage you to send in your book recommendations, movie suggestions, and TV show favorites!

Tune in every Friday for lively discussions, insightful analysis, and passionate conversations about the books, movies, and TV shows that leave us spellbound. Let's celebrate the magic of storytelling together on "The Lit Flick Club” podcast!

Te invitamos a que hagas parte de esta conversación y ames este mundo, tanto como nosotras.

title: The Golden Review
description: Welcome to The Golden Review, the show where we talk about a movie. No, seriously, that’s all we do. Kick back, relax, and enjoy the shenanigans that endure! We plan to upload as regularly as possible (definitely not daily!), and we plan to talk about a large variety of movies and even longer TV series that can basically be considered a movie NOTE: THERE WILL BE SPOILERS! Who are we? - Well, we're a group a Christian Movie Enjoyers with different views on movies! What's our goal? - We have two goals. Firstly, give our viewers something to enjoy. We want you to enjoy listening to us talk about movies and laugh at the stuff that we say. Secondly, we want to give our viewers an example of a Godly friendship through the way that we interact with each other as well as our audience. One who serves their audience serves the God who made us.

title: A True Christian Life
description: 1. Find Jesus & Find Rest (Matthew 11:28) Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. The New International Version translates the passage as: "Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. Dili magpakasala kay mao ni hinungdan. Christians, do not leave the Lord, do not turn away from the Lord. Don't sin because that's the reason. We christians are not for this world. Sin lead to stress, and we got nothing of tender joy of it. If the christian continues to sin, our spiritual life and relationships to Jesus will slowly die "Sin leads to wickedness" "The single most important thing in your life is the condition of your heart". CHOOSE TO TRUST GOD Isaiah 30:15- For thus said the Lord God, the Holy One of Israel: In returning and rest you shall be saved; in quietness and in trust shall be your strength. Why we should trust God? 1. God gave his life for you 2. God Loves You so much (Jeremiah 31:3 ) 3. God has always provided for You 4. God knows better than you (Luke 12:7) “And the very hairs on your head are all numbered. So don't be afraid; you are more valuable to God than a whole flock of sparrows.” Lamentations 3:22-23 ( Do read in the Bible) Let's Hold on the Promise of the Lord! Importante ta sa Ginoo! If we don't apply the word of God, we will not be healed. Even we have many memory verse. If we don't apply the word of God, we will not be change, and this some reason christians will back into the past and slowly weakens in serving God.

title: Mumbai Raj
description:
Ladies and gentlemen, get ready to immerse yourselves in the enchanting world of Bollywood! Welcome to "Mumbai Raj," the ultimate podcast channel where we dive into the glitz, glamour, and endless drama of Hindi cinema.

From show reviews to juicy gossip, from behind-the-scenes secrets to epic movie discussions, "Mumbai Raj" is your one-stop destination for everything Bollywood. Join me as we embark on a rollercoaster ride through the colorful lanes of Mumbai's film industry. Expect witty banter, hilarious anecdotes, and engaging conversations with Bollywood and industry insiders.

Whether you're a die-hard fan of romantic sagas, high-octane action, or soul-stirring melodies, "Mumbai Raj" has got you covered. Together, we'll explore the fascinating world of Bollywood movies, dissecting the plots, analyzing the performances, and unraveling the hidden gems.

So, grab your popcorn, put on your dancing shoes, and get ready to experience Bollywood like never before! From the iconic classics to the latest blockbusters, "Mumbai Raj" will be your guide through the glimmering galaxy of stars, where fun and mischief are always on the menu.

Disclaimer: The views and opinions expressed in this podcast are solely those of the host and guests and do not necessarily reflect the official policies or positions of "Mumbai Raj."

title: MiD Boys
description: This is a podcast about movies and for those who love the big screen in the dark room. Our goal with this is to showcase the best and the weird parts of all films alike. Viewing a wide range of films going back decades to the latest in the box office, one thing remains the same: Movie's are MID. Highlighting why we get out of our homes, and sit shoulder to shoulder with strangers for 2 hrs to watch a film that leaves you feeling.....well let's talk about it. We dont know when, we dont know how but films went from CINEMATIC to MID. The film industry has become dysfunctional and the futre of the picture is in danger. The era of MID films is now and its up to all of us to keep watching the screen. The world has given up on the cinematic but not us. Join us as we rank, discuss and challenge some of our favorite films.

title: 7arte al descubierto
description:
¡Bienvenidos a "Séptimo Arte, al Descubierto"!

En "Séptimo Arte, al Descubierto" te invitamos a sumergirte en el fascinante mundo del cine y las series de televisión. En cada episodio, exploraremos a fondo una película o serie distinta, analizando lo que más nos cautivó y aquello que no nos terminó de convencer, incluyendo SPOILERS, para aquellos que ya disfrutaron de la obra o para quienes no temen conocer detalles antes de sumergirse en la trama.

Nuestros anfitriones te llevarán en un emocionante recorrido cinematográfico que abarcará desde joyas clásicas hasta los más recientes éxitos de taquilla, y desde las aclamadas series de streaming hasta los programas televisivos más adictivos. Cualquiera que sea tu género o preferencia, aquí encontrarás contenido adaptado a tus gustos.

En cada episodio, compartiremos nuestras impresiones sinceras y opiniones sobre la película o serie en cuestión. Analizaremos la dirección, las actuaciones, la narrativa y aspectos técnicos, además de sumergirnos en los temas y mensajes que la obra transmite.

Una vez que hayamos explorado a fondo la obra, ofreceremos una recomendación basada en nuestras apreciaciones y consideraciones personales. Utilizaremos nuestra escala de clasificación para ayudarte a identificar si una película o serie es un "Imperdible", un "Merece la pena verlo" o un "Opcional", para que puedas elegir tu próxima aventura audiovisual de manera informada.

Pero eso no es todo. Queremos que tú también formes parte de esta aventura cinematográfica. ¡Envíanos tus comentarios, preguntas y sugerencias sobre las películas o series que te gustaría que analicemos en futuros episodios! Valoramos tus opiniones y queremos que sean parte de la conversación.

Ya seas un apasionado cinéfilo o un seriéfilo empedernido, "Séptimo Arte, al Descubierto" es el podcast que estabas esperando. Acompáñanos en cada episodio para descubrir nuevos títulos, revivir tus favoritos y explorar lo mejor del mundo del entretenimiento audiovisual.

Así que, prepárate para una inmersión profunda en el "Séptimo Arte, al Descubierto". ¡Suscríbete ahora y déjate llevar por la magia del cine y las series con nosotros! ¡Nos vemos en el próximo episodio!

title: The Dynamic Brew
description: Meet Nick and Justin, two best friends of 20+ years from New Jersey that have no business speaking out loud, but have somehow found two mics to record with and do it anyway! Listeners will get to enjoy our topical and unique humor (deemed hazardous to most living organisms). We go over the latest in movie entertainment, TV/Film history, as well as comic books with so much more content. We also break-down and discuss real life topics such fun memories, friendships, relationship advice, crazy life stories with special guest cameos. We present to you, THE DYNAMIC BREW!

title: Nothing Podcast
description: Nos gustan muchas cosas, aprendemos cosas nuevas cada día, no pudimos escoger un solo tema.

title: Hitchin’ the Trailer
description: We have fun talking about new and throw back trailers of movies

title: ALFILMBET
description: In each episode of ALFILMBET, hosts Alec and Sam explore a different film, sharing their individual opinions and analyses to uncover hidden meanings and offer valuable insight. The alphabetical structure (one letter per episode, with both the filmmaker's name and the film title beginning with the same letter) allows us to discuss everything from beloved classics to little-known gems. Join us for a fun, alphabetical journey through film!

title: AllOuttaBubbleGum podcast
description:
The official podcast of the AllOuttaBubbleGum website. For all things action cinema.

Join Brenton, Marteen, Stein, and others in discovering the good, bad and everything in between that action cinema has to offer.

title: Septima Letra Podcast
description: Podcast enfocado al Cine, Series, Literatura, Teatro y artes en general. Conducido por Angel Cornacchione (@angelcornacchione) y Pablo Garcia (@lectorenpausa).
